line_1: In coat of mail, with voice austere,
What philosophic Sage of pride austere
line_2: Can lend conviction an attentive ear?

line_1: But if thou com'st with frown austere
line_2: To nurse the brood of care and fear;

line_1: O Virtue smooth thy brow austere,

line_2: Parent of manners like herself severe,
